TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Kodic, title = Kodic, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kodic} }

S.FORM: Kodic Itiniay i Fengbin Cen no Hualien ko Kodic a niyaro', 77 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 208 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 83% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 173 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 17% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 35 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Kebalan 46%, Amis 31%, Tayal 1%, Paiwan 1%, Rukai 1%, roma4%.

Kodic Itiniay i Fengbin Cen no Hoalien ko Kodic a niyaro', 77 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 208 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 83% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 173 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 17% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 35 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Kebalan 46%, Amis 31%, Tayal 1%, Paiwan 1%, Rokai 1%, roma4%.
